div.p: An extension to represent a comment or other relevant information about dosage calculation basis.

description.value: In the context of scheduling a time in the future, this flag specifies that the time must be strictly obeyed.

requirements.value: A need to represent the element administerAtSpecificTime (GisEksakt in Norwegian, type Boolean): medication must be given/taken at exact times.

definition.value: In the context of scheduling a time in the future, this flag specifies that the time must be strictly obeyed.
